SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It looks like there's something here.
Let's try digging.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.text:
It's saying something or other
about the sand's energy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.text:
Apparently it'll keep the sand
from falling apart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.text:
Sounds like it'll keep the sand
from clumping together.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.text:
It's talking about the sand's
shifting ability.

SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Why is this world so dang HOT!? I'm sweatin'
like a hog in a clapboard shack, and I ain't even
doin' anything! Somebody gimme a nice cold
river to dive into.

SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn

SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Dang, hon, you sound cool as can be!
Ain't you feelin' this heat?

SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I actually feel cooler being covered up—
and I don't need to worry about sunburn.
Now let's see if we can find a triangle
before you melt into a puddle of goo.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Heck, this battleship's even bigger than
the landing ship I was on when I moved
outta the Grenil Archipelago!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And now it's nothing but scrap.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I've had a feeling for a while now that
someone is watching me, but all I see
is that scarecrow—which makes zero
sense in a desert, let me just add.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Not her! Me! Scarecrow! I haven't seen a human out this way in days.
Where exactly did you come from, anyway?
The airship? The cruise ship? The submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, butter my biscuits! A talkin' scarecrow!
I reckoned there wasn't nothin' in this here
world but sand and more sand, but maybe
we're gonna have some fun after all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm Formina, and this is Bonnie.
We've come to this world looking for a triangle.
Do you happen to know anything about that?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Hi there! I'm Scarecrow. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no earthly idea! Also, I don't know anything about any triangles. Humans might, though, so why not head over to the airship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I ain't much for dealin' with talkin'
scarecrows, so what say I leave this
to you, Officer Franklyn?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Always so quick to shirk responsibility...
But sure, I'll take point; I kind of like
unique fellows like this, anyway.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Think you can show us the way
to this airship, Scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One airship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
But the sand's preventing
us from going any further.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This robot is like something out
of a movie. Does it move?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
YO, SCARECROW! BEEN A HOT MINUTE, BUDDY!
ALSO, WHY ARE YOU WANDERING ALL OVER FROM
HELL TO BREAKFAST WITH THIS HUMAN, HUH!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
You can change the
direction of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
ME? NAH! I CAN'T DO SQUAT, BUDDY!
BUT THE ROBOT CAN!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
There's no need to shout.
I can hear you just fine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
SORRY ABOUT THAT! THIS IS JUST THE NATURAL
VOLUME FOR ME! NOW HANG ON AND I'LL GET
THAT SAND CHANGED FOR YOU, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the airship, huh?
So people live here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh sure! Lots of 'em!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It's surprisingly spacious in here,
but I still don't think I'd want to
make it my permanent home.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm Formina Franklyn. Judging by your reaction,
I take it you don't get outside visitors from
other worlds very often?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Of course we don't! ...Ah, but does this mean
the legends about Pandora are true? You must
tell me everything you know about Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I'll do it if you calm down.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: That's right! Let's all take it easy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Shut up, strawman! ...AHEM! Yes, well,
I suppose it's possible I got a smidge
excited there. Apologies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm the Professor, and I'm researching the history
of the Crowrealm. Though a desert now, this land
once had something called an 'ocean,' and this
very airship once soared through the skies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Alas, now the world is nothing but sand,
and the airships lie in pieces on the ground.
And what is the cause of this misery, you ask?
The answer to that...is said to be Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I remember hearing about Pandora's Box when
I was a kid—supposedly it had all manner of
calamities sealed inside it? Still, I always thought
it was just a story to scare children.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Our legend claims the one who opened the box was a human from the outside—and they go on to say that the one to close the box will be another human from the outside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, how I hope the legend is a lie. If it's true,
it means our world is held sway by the whims
of outsiders! And in that case, what are the
rest of us even worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Right? What's my worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
That's a problem for you to solve. Still,
it's possible Pandora has something to do
with the triangles we're searching for,
so can you tell me where to find it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
...Seriously? It's just a legend. Nothing more.
Do you truly plan to just blindly follow it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It might be a legend to you,
but it could be a valuable clue to
us in our search for triangles. Also, if we manage to find it and close it,
that could solve both of our problems in
one fell swoop.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I don't know if I should call you an oddity or really adventurous... Are all people from the outside like you? Er, anyway. Be that all as it may, I sadly have no idea where Pandora is. You'll just have to find it yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oooh, oooh! I know where it is!
It could be here. Or there.
Or way out there someplace.
Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let me leave you with this warning:
Do not make friends with the scarecrows.
They're all irresponsible oafs to the last,
just like this straw-headed ninny here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: So the scarecrows aren't yours?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Perish the thought! If I had to guess,
I imagine they came from Pandora itself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Another giant robot...
I wonder if Pandora's inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Did the fiends also come from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So what's older,
Pandora or the scarecrows?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, that conversation was pointless.
Let's just look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Pandora's not here, apparently.
Let's go look somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, if the sands start giving us
trouble again, we know who to call.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
This looks like a war robot of some kind.
That's a rather unpleasant find.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, since I don't want it to be,
I'm going to go with my gut here
and just assume it isn't.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like it's Pandora,
but maybe it can at least change the
flow of the sand for us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
I'm no engineer, but it's weird how
things can affect the sands from
so far away, right?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Were these robots made specifically to
change the flow of the sand? And is there
a reason they all look so different?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: So do scarecrows operate the robots? And why are you scarecrows, anyway?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: Ugh. This is a waste of time.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like it's Pandora,
but maybe it can at least change the
flow of the sand for us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hi, Sweetcrow! Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You wouldn't happen to know anything about
the triangles we're looking for, would you?
They'd fit in this frame.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Triangles live in the ♥s of all scarecrows...
and you're totally welcome to take
my ♥ home, lover girl! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Don't think I know you, friend.
Are you another junker?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
No, I'm Formina. My partner Bonnie and
I have come here looking for triangles.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well now, that's some unusual treasure
you're out for. I mostly look for gears and
engine parts and showerheads and... Well,
you know. Things people want.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This place is a veritable mountain of treasure,
but because of that, I have a bunch of scoundrels
in here bugging me. ...See?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
They've been fighting a war ever since
Pandora opened up—even though the
world's like it is and no one has any
clue what the war is for anymore. Hell, I don't even know if we're supposed
to destroy this place or protect it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is a submarine:
protector of the ocean.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
You still think of this as the ocean, huh?
That's pretty sad. Still, if we can put an
end to their battle, I think we should.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm hoping it leads us to a triangle,
but I'm honestly sort of grasping
at straws here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, good luck out there. All treasure hunts
start from hope, and I for one hope that you
find what you're looking for!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This is the only place we haven't looked.
Do you think Pandora will be here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Maybe.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
We're looking for a triangle—
and Pandora, while we're at it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pandora, eh? Yes, I've heard the rumors:
Close the box and poof! The war is over.
Honestly, I have doubts that something
so convenient actually exists.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Still, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, as you've no doubt seen.
So if Pandora is anywhere, it's likely here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Well then, let's look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm coming with you. Heck, maybe we'll meet
whoever opened Pandora in the first place—
although if they went in as a human and are
still alive, they're probably a monster now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Then let's go hunt a monster!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
There are a bunch of robot production
lines here, but most of them don't seem
to be active.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: No, listen. Something is still operational around here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Hey, look! Monsters over that way.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This production line's still active,
but what is it making?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sand. It's making sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You scarecrows are all the same:
liars to the last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I get it now! That's not sand—it's robots
that are the SIZE of sand! All the sand in
this world is actually just war robots that
are made here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: ...Pretty sure it's just sand. But even if it were robots, what good would that do us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: If a single ant tried to attack you, you'd just brush if off—but if a swarm of them did, it would be a different story. Then there's the fact those robots outside can change the flow of sand. Something has the ability to manipulate it, and I think that 'something' is Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, let's say you're correct, and the robots
covered the world in sand to win the war.
The war is over now, but the sand remains.
So how are we supposed to remove it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
The first thing we need to do is close Pandora
and stop sand from being produced.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This is hopeless.
There's just too much sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I can't even reckon if our attacks
are workin' against it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, so I found this inside.
Do you think it will help us fight Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Look! That's our triangle! So it was connected to Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, shoot. Now that we've got the triangle,
there ain't no reason to stay in this world.
What do you think, darlin'?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Let's settle the score with Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Let's go home.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Ho, friend! Find any treasure?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: We sure did!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Glad to hear it—but there are still some
for whom the battle is not yet over.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
My little friend here can find all sorts
of things buried in the sand. Poor thing managed to survive the war,
but can't seem to put it behind him.
Hoping this little treasure hunt of yours
can help him move past it for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You're suggesting we might find some kind of
anti-Pandora secret weapon under the sand?
Well then, what's your name, little guy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sarab.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Let's go find a secret weapon!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Did you figure out a way
to fight the sand yet?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
We sure did—and I'm looking forward
to seeing the results.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
I can't believe you actually ended
up closing Pandora... This isn't the
outcome I was expecting at all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: You're talking like you didn't want Pandora to be closed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
If it was up to me, I would've chosen to
leave it open, yeah. But you proved your
own worth by doing it, and that's what
matters most. Anyway, keep it up!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Huh? Keep what up?
And for whose sake?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: So what's that mean for me?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: Why don't you come with us?

SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.text:
I can't imagine anybody livin'
in a place with so much sand.

SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Maybe they're just hiding somewhere—
and if we find them, we might find a
clue to the next triangle.

SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Pbbbt! Dangnabbit! Soon as I open my mouth
to talk, it gets filled with sand! I hate this place
already, so let's find what we need and get the
heck outta here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I ain't never seen an airship in person
before—can't believe a sucker this
big actually used to soar the skies!
Sure wish I could ride in it...

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The scarecrow can talk!
I repeat, the scarecrow can talk!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'm a talker, all right!
Haven't seen a human out this way
in quite a few days, though. So where'd you come from?
Cruise ship? Battleship? Submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm Bonnie Blair, and this cute l'il darlin'
here is Formina Franklyn. We came to this
place lookin' for triangles—don't reckon
you know anything about that?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oooh! Okay, so my name is Scarecrow— er, not that you asked. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no idea. Also, I don't know any triangles. Humans might know something though, so why not head over to the submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This feller's gettin' on my last nerve;
you mind doing the talkin' for a spell?
If I gotta deal with him, I'm gonna end
up usin' him for a punchin' bag.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Violence is never the answer, Bonnie;
we're not some hoodlums from a street gang.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Right then. Can you show us the way
to this submarine, Scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One submarine, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
But the sands are preventing us
from going any further.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This robot is like something out
of a movie. Does it move?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Hello, Sweetcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Scarecrow, baby! Good to see you! ♥
And sure, that's an easy ask. ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You can change the
direction of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Not me, hot stuff. But the robot can! ♥
Go on now, big guy! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This must be the submarine.
Do people actually live here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Finally, a place that isn't full of sand.
Not hard to see why people would
want to make their home here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
It's not often we get visitors from
the outside. Who are you people?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm Formina Franklyn. My partner Bonnie
and I are here in search of triangles.
You wouldn't know anything that could
help us track one down, would you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, joy. Another weirdo. Well, as you
can see, the Crowrealm here has been
devastated by a war. We've got scrap lying around everywhere,
so if you see anything you want,
feel free to just take it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Er, that's not quite what we mean.
We're looking for specific triangles
that fit in a frame like this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, you're welcome to look wherever
you fancy, and I sure hope you find 'em.
But that's all I've got to say on that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Okay, then. How about strange events you
know of, or special places you could direct
us to? Any clues that might point us in the
right direction, basically.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
If you're asking me for a special place
out here in the desert, there's only
one option: Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora? You mean the box
that was full of misfortune?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
And a scholar on top of everything! If you know about Pandora, that means
it's likely infected your world as well.
No wonder you're so desperate in your
search for those triangles.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, it won't be long until this whole world
is devoured by Pandora, so I very much hope
you find what you're looking for.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
You don't know where we could
find Pandora, do you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Oooh, but I know where it is! It could be here. Or there. Or way out that way someplace. Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wiser words were never spoken. Look,
just have Scarecrow take you where
you want to go; that's his job.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
This looks like a war robot of some kind.
That's a rather unpleasant find.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, since I don't want it to be,
I'm going to go with my gut here
and just assume it isn't.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Another giant robot...
I wonder if Pandora's inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Did the fiends also come from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So what's older, Pandora
or the scarecrows?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, that conversation was pointless.
Let's just look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Pandora's not here, apparently.
Let's go look somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, if the sands start giving us
trouble again, we know who to call.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like it's Pandora,
but maybe it can at least change the
flow of the sand for us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
I'm no engineer, but it's weird how
things can affect the sands from so
far away, right?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Were these robots made specifically to
change the flow of the sand? And is there
a reason they all look so different?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: So do scarecrows operate the robots? And why are you scarecrows, anyway?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: Ugh. This is a waste of time.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This robot doesn't look like it's Pandora,
but maybe it can at least change the
flow of the sand for us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
You don't know where we could find
a triangle, do you? One that fits into
this frame?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: THE TRIANGLES ARE THE SCARECROWS! I'M THE TRIANGLE, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
We're looking for a triangle—
and Pandora while we're at it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, so if Pandora is real,
this makes as much sense as anywhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Speaking of which, we've got
a war robot incoming!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Was that really Pandora?
It was weaker than I expected.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, I suppose it was a little pathetic
for an immortal war machine. You'll likely
have to keep searching somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Let's see if we can find somewhere that's
more in line with what we're looking for.
If not, we can always come back.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It's the wreckage of a battleship.
Sure looks disaster-like to me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Could be Pandora, yep!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: This is Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: You know about this place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Great. Then tell us about
the triangles.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The triangles are Pandora.
Do not involve yourself with them.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Well, if this is Pandora, and the triangles are also Pandora, this is where we'll find what we need—so let's go have a look!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's go have a look!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The battleship isn't active at the moment.
I suppose that's no surprise.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: It sure isn't!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And yet, I hear a sound.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Why did you come with us?
I thought you said this was Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I do not know what lies inside.
Therefore, I must learn.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Do you know anything else about Pandora?
We'd appreciate any help you can give.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora is sand. Pandora creates the sand.
It buries this world in mountains of sand,
causing it to suffocate.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So all we need to do is stop more sand from
being produced and grab the triangle that's
actually Pandora? Well, that sounds simple.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Piece of cake!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The sand is fiends.
The fiends are sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: That's clearly no ordinary sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora controls the sand. Every grain is
a perfect miniature recreation of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: This is also Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Where did you even find that!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sounds like you found Pandora.
So what happens now?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I don't know. This battleship is Pandora,
the sand is all Pandora, the triangle we
were searching for is Pandora... It's ALL Pandora, and yet we still don't
have a clue how to close the thing.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Why not try this thing?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I went ahead and fixed it up earlier.
I think it's some kind of search mech?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Convenient that there's a tool to defeat
Pandora just waiting for us to find it.
But hey, I'll take it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And we're off.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: The time to battle Pandora has come.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: It has—and we're going to see it done.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
The sand has stopped.
Pandora has been sealed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: I can't believe you closed Pandora... Just who are you people?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Just some weirdos here to find triangles— but it takes all kinds to save the world. Speaking of which, it's time for you to get back and save your own world, yes?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: I want to save worlds too!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Then let's go save them together.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: You can save them from here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This here's a submarine, which means this
area used to be an ocean once upon a time.
What kinda crazy war did the people wage
to turn an ocean into a dang desert?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I don't know, but there were clearly
survivors, since I see a scarecrow there.
...Not sure why crows are attacking a
submarine, but hey, what do I know?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Or the scarecrow ITSELF was a survivor.
Didn't consider that, but sure.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Watch yourself, Formina!
There's no tellin' what kind of weird
weapon this thing might be packin'.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm Formina, and this is Bonnie.
We've come to this world looking
for triangles.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wonderful to meet you as well! I'm Scarecrow,
and I've been standing here for three thousand
days waiting for someone like you to come by.
Oh, but this is a glorious moment!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: That'd be great! I'm a talker—I love talking. So where are the two of you from? The airship? The battleship? The cruise ship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
We're actually not from this world, so we
don't know much about it. It sounds like
there are other people here, though,
so could you maybe guide us to them?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One cruise ship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
But the sands are stopping us
from going any further.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Is this some kind of war robot? It's not
going to suddenly start moving and attack
us like a bad movie, right?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello, Strangecrow! I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Are you even listening to us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Then I'll take that as a yes. Thanks!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Just seeing an abandoned cruise ship like this
makes you feel like something bad is going to
happen inside. Are we going to find a triangle
here, or just a lot of trouble?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I don't know about any triangles,
but you'll sure find people!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Yup. This place screams 'ghost ship'
more than 'cruise ship.'

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
We're not peddlers, I'm afraid.
We're just searching for triangles
for reasons we can't get into.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, I see. I thought you were a junker.
Well, I'm the Engineer, and I don't know
anything about abstract objects like triangles—
and nor do I care, if we're being honest.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You don't happen to know any special places
where strange things happen, do you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this sand-blighted hellhole? Hmmm...
Well, I suppose a place like that
would have to be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pandora? As in the box of misfortune?
That sounds even more abstract than
what we were talking about.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this world, Pandora is real. It is Pandora
that plunged this place into war and ruin,
and the horror of that continues to this day. So if we hope to free ourselves from all of
this someday, we must find a way to survive
and close Pandora once and for all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Maybe Pandora has something to do
with the triangles we're seeking.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'll do whatever it takes to get a triangle,
but aside from that, no promises.
Now where can I find Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I have no idea where Pandora is.
I suggest you ask a scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Do you know where Pandora is?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course! You simply go this way,
then that way, then some way!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Another giant robot...
I wonder if Pandora's inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: Do you know where Pandora is?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: Ugh. This is a waste of time.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This robot doesn't look like it's Pandora,
but maybe it can at least change the
flow of the sand for us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Do you know where we might find
a triangle that fits in this frame?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Another giant robot...
I wonder if Pandora's inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Did the fiends also come from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So what's older, Pandora
or the scarecrows?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, that conversation was pointless.
Let's just look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Pandora's not here, apparently.
Let's go look somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe! The fiends are gone,
so I now have a triangle inside me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, we can't very well rip you apart to
get it out, so just take good care of it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Sadness! Oh, you're so kind!
I hope you find your triangle soon!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like it's Pandora,
but maybe it can at least change the
flow of the sand for us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Do you know where we might find
a triangle that fits in this frame?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sure thing, sweet cheeks! ♥ Just ask
yourself this: what's the most special-est
place in the entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥
Here's a hint: it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It's the wreckage of a battleship.
It sure looks disaster-like to me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Do you know anything about Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I hope that wasn't Pandora.
That'd be a real letdown.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Did I not just tell you
this is not Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I had a feeling you'd say that...
Well, let's just look somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
And just what do you plan to do
once you actually find Pandora!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the only place
we haven't looked yet.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yes, we came from another world in search
of triangles. Do you know if Pandora is
somewhere around here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So the legends are true—an outsider will
open Pandora, and an outsider will close it!
Is this prophecy? An accurate prediction?
A cleverly executed program? Whatever it may be, one thing is certain:
history will now begin to move.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yes, well, introductions! I'm the Professor,
and I'm researching the Crowrealm's history.
I've spent hour after endless hour in this place,
but today, you will put an end to that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Just so we're clear, our main priority is
finding a triangle; Pandora's just something
we hope will lead us to it. So how are we meant to close it, then?
Does it have a lid like an actual box?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I haven't the faintest idea; no one has
ever seen Pandora for themselves.
Even if it were inside this airship, I doubt
you'd gain access to it so easily.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, if there might be a triangle in there,
we've got to get inside. I'm going to see
if there's a way to do that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's go check!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: It's well-guarded, so there's clearly something important in here. Now where could Pandora be...?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora's secrets lie deeper within.
Let's go, so I might witness history!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Deeper within!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Moving sand... So this is the truth of Pandora? It's just digging up sand from somewhere and scattering it all across our world? Absurd! Ridiculous! Complete and utter rot! I can't believe we let all time come to a standstill because we were afraid of this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: This isn't sand—it's robots!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
If the sand is robots, that explains
how it can be controlled.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I fear I don't understand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It unfortunately means we're currently
surrounded by countless robots. I just
hope we can get out of this place alive.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Living is good, and I'd like to do
a whole lot more of it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: We made it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, we managed to make it out,
but we clearly don't stand a chance
against that many sand robots at once.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The legends say you can close Pandora,
so I'm sure it's possible.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Fortunately, the triangle we stumbled on
during the battle is exactly what we came
here for in the first place.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You will need power equal to Pandora's
own if you wish to fight it and win.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Okay, what do you want now?
What do you know?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Use this. It hates Pandora, and may prove
a great aid in your upcoming fight.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Hate begets nothing!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Whatever you say.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sarab will kill Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Hey! Where are you going!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Where are you going!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
The time has come at last... Oh, to think
I might witness a turning point in history
with my own eyes.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
Can you believe it!? I was actually
able to experience the moment
a legend became reality!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
You did it! You actually closed Pandora!
Ha ha haaa... Hey, wait. What the heck are
we supposed to do with the rest of our lives?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text: Yeah, how am I supposed to live?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This reminds me of the cruise ship that
sank 'cause the crew got a might careless.
This is why you'll never find this gal on
a ship 'less I got no other choice!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Actually, this place was already
a ruin when I got here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Is that a talking doll? Or a guy in a suit?
It's clearly someone dressed as a scarecrow,
but I can't believe how realistic it is... Anyway, hello there, Mr. Scarecrow.
I'm Formina Franklyn, and this is
my partner, Bonnie Blair.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Why, yes! I am Scarecrow, actually! I had no idea I was famous enough for complete strangers to know my name!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
We're here searching for a triangle.
You wouldn't happen to have seen
one anywhere, would you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Sure haven't! But you should
try asking someone else.
Here, I'll show you the way!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One battleship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
But the sand is stopping us
from going any further.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
This robot is like something out
of a movie. Does it move?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Hello, Smilecrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Aha ha ha ha ha! Scarecrow?
Aha ha ha ha ha! The flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
You can change the
direction of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: The flow of sand! Aha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Even the battleship's gone to ruin.
Are there really people living here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
There sure are! But you won't
find any triangles.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Everything's shut down inside.
I suppose that makes sense.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The arrival of souls from the
outside world is an omen.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
How do you know we're
from the outside?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: In that case, where's our triangle?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I knew it. People who insist they're
all-knowing can't ever be trusted. Oh, but don't worry—I wasn't expecting
anything from you to begin with.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm not sure how you can expect me
to not feel slighted by that response. But very well! I shall reveal your fate:
you will find Pandora within the submarine.
All else must be decided by you

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Do you know where this
submarine is, Scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I wonder what Pandora even is...

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Do you think this robot has
something to do with triangles?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
You haven't seen any triangles, have you?
Ones that fit into this frame?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
It's another giant robot. I wonder
if there's a triangle inside it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Did the fiends also come from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So what's older, Pandora
or the scarecrows?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, that conversation was pointless.
Let's just look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Pandora's not here, apparently.
Let's go look somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, if the sands start giving us
trouble again, we know who to call.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Do you think this robot has
something to do with triangles?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
What's the most special-est place in the
entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥ Here's a hint:
it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Is this another robot? Because it just looks
like a tank. Does it have something to do
with the triangles?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Why do I feel like you don't have
any idea what you're talking about?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: No triangles here, then. Got it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This airship clearly hasn't
been used in a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yes, actually. We came from another
world in search of triangle.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So you're not here to close Pandora? Blast!
Well, I am the Professor, a researcher of
the Crowrealm's history who is also seeking
a way to seal Pandora for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
A man in the battleship who called himself
the Wiseman said we're going to find Pandora
in the submarine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The Wiseman said that? Then you
must go to the submarine at once!
This place holds nothing for you!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: But we have an enemy incoming...

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now go! Find the Junkman in the submarine,
and get his help to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Whatever. Let's find the submarine.
We can think when we're there.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Yup, this is a submarine, all right.
I guess this area must've also been an
ocean at some point in the past, though I
wonder if we'll really find Pandora here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Outsiders have come just as the Wiseman
foretold! He said it would be up to you
whether or not you closed Pandora.
So...will you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
We came here in search of a triangle.
If obtaining that requires closing Pandora,
that's that's what we're going to do.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora is the cause of all desolation in
this world. It brought calamity to the land
and launched a war that rages to this day. And if we hope to right these most
terrible wrongs, we must close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Do you really think we can do that?
Have you ever considered the possibility
that the prophecy is wrong?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I mean, just looking at you, I wouldn't think
you could do it. And yet, you've got a certain
moxie, so I think you'll pull through for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: For us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, first we need to find out if Pandora
is in the submarine. That's step one.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The fact there are security robots around certainly suggests something is here. But so far, we haven't found anything.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Not as of yet, but the path goes on.
Now come. I know we will find it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: We'll find it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm not seeing anything but sand—are you sure
Pandora really exists? It's not just a fever dream
the people here dreamed up so they had
something to blame this world's ruin on?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The sand... Of course! The sand is the cause of all this! The sand is Pandora! It was created here in this place, and once it spread across the Crowrealm, it sent the entire world to ruin.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Now you're blaming everything on sand?
Whatever. Let's just get out of here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
