SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I cannot allow the truth to leave this place.
This world has given up on moving forward,
instead blaming everything on Pandora—
and that is how it must remain.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I hear you have come in
search of a triangle, yes?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Here it is. Take it and leave,
telling no one what you know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: You can't silence me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: You've got a deal.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: I'll need your silence as well.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Then you leave me no choice but force!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora never existed in the first place.
How are we supposed to close something
that doesn't even exist?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Is this true, Junkman?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Seems so. If this world is going to be saved,
it will be done not by an outsider, but by
the sweat and toil of those who live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Well, I suppose that's not so bad; the Crowrealm is our home, after all, so it's only fitting that we should be the main characters in its story. You have my thanks—and I swear to you now, we will take our world back! We cannot thank you enough.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: I'm going to help them!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Good luck.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Or you can come with us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Pandora really is sand after all... 
But if every grain of sand is Pandora,
there's no way we can close it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
The prophecy claims you can,
so it must be true. Now take this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
That's the triangle we're lookin' for!
You had it this whole dang time!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
It was inside Pandora—and the prophecy
stated you would obtain it, as well.
All has come to pass as it was foretold.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Well done! I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: I'm sorry, but Pandora is actually the sand— as in, all of the sand. We simply don't have the strength to close it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
The sand is...? But no, that can't be!
The sand isn't attacking us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Maybe it hasn't been switched on,
or maybe it hasn't been ordered to... Wait, that's it! We need a way to stop
orders being relayed to the sand!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Wonderful! Now here, take this.
He's my little helper and a good,
fine boy, and I know he'll aid you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Well, howdy there, pardner!
What's your handle?

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: You clearly have high hopes for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The prophecy has been fulfilled,
and Pandora is closed at last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The Crowrealm has finally been returned to us,
and from this day forward, we shall restore it
to its former glory with our own hands!

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
I'm going to stay here and help
with the restoration.

SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W13_EVAR_BOFO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: Actually, why not come with me?
